duck: XFX is the manufacturing division of Hong Kong-based Pine Technology Holdings Limited.

}} 'XFX' is the manufacturing division of Hong Kong-based Pine Technology
Holdings Limited (). The XFX division has its headquarters in Ontario,
California and specializes in the manufacturing of video cards, power supplies
and motherboards.
